text: Inder Kumar (26 August 1973 â€“ 28 July 2017) was an Indian actor. He was born in Jaipur, Rajasthan. Kumar was best known for playing supporting roles in Hindi movies such as Wanted, Tumko Na Bhool Paayenge and Kahin Pyaar Na Ho Jaaye. == Death == Kumar died of a heart attack on 28 July 2017 in Mumbai, Maharastra at the age of 43. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Filmography at Bollywood Hungama Category:1972 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Indian movie actors
title: Inder Kumar
